var.name: changes
changes
var.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `gxt_cvsindex` ( `projguid` varchar(40) default '', `kbguid` varchar(40) default '', `mdlid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `objcls` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `objid` varchar(40) default '', `objnam` varchar(255) default '', `objdsc` varchar(255) default '', `objupdts` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `objowner` varchar(40) default '', `objtypguid` varchar(40) default '', `hash` varchar(40) default '', `gmtoffset` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`projguid`,`kbguid`,`mdlid`,`objcls`,`objnam`) ) ENGINE=$engine DEFAULT CHARSET=$charset COMMENT='';

var.name: changes
var.string: ALTER TABLE `gxt_todos` DROP COLUMN `timetrack`; ALTER TABLE `gxt_cvsindex` ADD COLUMN `ownertype` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' AFTER `objowner` , ADD COLUMN `generated` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `ownertype`;

var.name: changes
changes
var.string: ALTER TABLE `gxt_evtqueue` CHANGE COLUMN `inoutlog` `inoutlog` MEDIUMTEXT NOT NULL;
